channel.title: Ipban
channel.description: Does anyone know the code so i can just use the command "::ipban" and ban them from my server insted of having to go to date ipban and paste their ips in there? Thanks ;D

item.title: Ipban
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights >= 2) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + " was pissed off soo much he  IPBANNED the idiot named " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    }

[/code]

put this in your client.java and just ipban em with the coomand just like this ::ipban loser

Read full topic
